# Notes App - LLM Reference Documentation

## Tech Stack Documentation

### AI SDK (Vercel)
- Full docs: https://ai-sdk.dev/llms.txt
- Use `generateObject()` for structured outputs with Zod schemas
- Use `streamText()` for streaming responses
- Keep API keys server-side only

### Better Auth
- Full docs: https://better-auth.com/llms.txt
- Drizzle adapter for PostgreSQL
- Supports email/password and OAuth providers
- Magic links and email verification supported

### Resend (Email)
- Full docs: https://resend.com/docs/llms-full.txt
- Simple API: `resend.emails.send({ from, to, subject, html })`
- Supports contact management and broadcasts

### Drizzle ORM
- Full docs: https://orm.drizzle.team/llms.txt
- Schema-first TypeScript ORM
- Infer types with `$inferSelect` and `$inferInsert`
- Use `drizzle-kit` for migrations

### Next.js
- Docs: https://nextjs.org/docs
- App Router with Server/Client components
- Route handlers in `app/api/`
- Server Actions with `'use server'`

### Tailwind CSS v4
- Docs: https://tailwindcss.com/docs
- CSS-first configuration
- Use `cn()` utility for conditional classes

### Zod
- Docs: https://zod.dev
- Schema validation and type inference
- Use with react-hook-form via `zodResolver`

## Key Patterns

### Structured AI Output
```typescript
const { object } = await generateObject({
  model: anthropic('claude-sonnet-4-20250514'),
  schema: z.object({ field: z.string() }),
  prompt: 'Extract data from input',
});
```

### Auth Check Pattern
```typescript
const session = await auth.api.getSession({
  headers: await headers(),
});
if (!session) redirect('/login');
```

### Drizzle Query Pattern
```typescript
const items = await db.select().from(table).where(eq(table.userId, userId));
```
